Halfway To Automatism

What to Expect

Surrealist poetry that takes various forms. It is hard to describe so you'll have to read for yourself to make what you can of it.

A Dada Tree

Pink and fluffy in the tall grass

A Dada Tree
A Dada Tree
What exactly can it be?

Is it iced cold orange liqueur?
Sip and listen, kittens pur

Bims broom breaks
Mid-well steaks

The sun casts a beautiful orange glow.

14 Oct 2019

The Persistence of Yo-Yos
